name: HardlyCold()
description:
A text-based, real-time strategy, stealth game. A little robot just wants freedom. Can you help him escape?

CONTROLS:

  • move [right|left|up|down] - Move in a given direction
  • mv [r|l|u|d] - Alias for move
  • take - Takes the item you're standing on
  • tk - alias for take

GOAL:
Complete all 10 levels to help the robot escape.

Enemies: Guards will try to stop you from leaving.

Basic Guards (red) will move randomly until they see you.

Sentry Guards (blue) won't move unless chasing a target and will return to their starting position when they're done investigating.

Keys Cards:
Collecting a key card will open or close all matching doors of the same color.
